===Etymology===
[[桐]] ([[w:Paulownia|Paulownia]]) + [[宮]] ([[palace]])
: [[w:Tai Jia|Tai Jia]] was forced by [[w:Yi Zhi|Yi Yin]] to live here for three years until he mended his ways and was allowed to return.
